shortdesc.ph: Starts the local video preview before joining the channel.

section.p: Before calling this method, you must: Record by API: Record a call by calling the APIs.

ul.li: Call to set the preview window and properties;
Call to turn on the video function.
The local preview enables the mirroring function by default.
After the local video preview is enabled, if you call to exit the channel, the local preview is still active. If you need to close the local preview, you need to call.
